page.title: 18BUS SERVICES, THWAITES
page.content: There are very few bus services in our area. Those there are go through The Green and The Hill. There are bus stops at The Green, The Hill and at St.Anne's Church. Every day two buses travel through The Green and The Hill to Millom and three buses return. Most of the buses travel from Ulverston through to Millom. There are extra buses for school children. On Saturdays and Sundays there are NO buses in the area at all. Only 18% of the families in our area said they used the services regularly. Those who used the bus service used it for shopping, going to school or college or to work. Very few used it for visiting. We wondered if more people would use the bus if the times were more convenient especially the 14% who do not own a car.
